name: Mami Tomoe - Puella Magi Madoka Magica
description:
This LoRA will get you a pretty decent Mami Tomoe, though it has a bit of trouble with her beret and headpiece. The results are still pretty good!

Triggered by: Mami Tomoe

If she is generating with a white skirt, add "yellow skirt" to your prompt and it should fix it.

I've had success with weight 1, but you may need to adjust to 1.1 or higher.
Models used in the previews are Salute mix, Ivory, and Aniflat. I did not try on a model geared toward photorealism.

You can remix her clothing by prompting for a weighted design, such as (girl wearing yellow kimono:1.2), I have attached an example of what that outcome looks like.

Enjoy!

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description: v2.0 data set has been updated to include cosplayer data, and to get her costume to draw more accurate

meta.prompt: 1girl, from_above, solo, Mami Tomoe, (detailed reflective anime style eyes), yellow skirt, golden hour, detailed textures, sitting in a \(field of yellow flowers outdoors\), posing, casual pose, aesthetic, intricate, light rays, sunlight, bokeh, sparkle, shimmer, glitter, sharp focus, <lora:MamiTomoe:1>
